text: The Variegateds Case () is a 1958 Soviet drama film directed by Nikolai Dostal.Ради роли в «Мэри Поппинс...» Олег Табаков надел чулки и сделал маникюрГадание на жен и «юмор ниже пояса»: 10 малоизвестных фактов о Михаиле Пуговкине«Грачи» Константина ЕршоваЮБИЛЕЙ ОЛЕГА ТАБАКОВА == Plot == A young officer, Sergei Korshunov, becomes an employee of the criminal investigation department, but in the process of investigating a series of crimes he realizes that this is not as simple as he thinks...Дело 'пестрых' == Cast == * Andrei Abrikosov * Vladimir Kenigson * Aleksandra Kazakova * Vsevolod Safonov * Aleksey Gribov * Evgeniy Matveev * Natalya Fateeva * Lev Polyakov * Tamara Loginova * Oleg Tabakov * Mikhail PugovkinДело «пёстрых» (1958) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * * Дело «пёстрых» on Kinopoisk Category:1958 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: The Variegateds Case
